install.name: VideoWhisper 2 Way Video Chat
install.author: VideoWhisper.com
install.description: Provides list of public and owned 2 way video chat rooms. Requires VideoWhisper.com 2 Way Video Chat component for Joomla. For more details, detailed installation instructions, other editions see: http://www.videowhisper.com/?p=2+Way+Video+Chat.

field.name: count
field.label: Count
field.description: The number of items to display. Default: 10

field.name: show
field.label: Room Types
field.description: Room Types to Show: Only rooms that are accessible will be shown. Default: Any Presence

field.name: online
field.label: Online Presence
field.description: Show rooms based on users online.

field.name: manage
field.label: Room Management
field.description: Show links to create and edit rooms.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display. Default: 10

param.name: show
param.label: Room Types
param.description: Room Types to Show. Only rooms that are accessible will be shown. Default: All Rooms

param.name: online
param.label: Online Presence
param.description: Show rooms based on users online. Default: Any Presence

param.name: manage
param.label: Room Management
param.description: Show links to create and edit rooms

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
